title: Textile, 1750–1800
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade), with moire
description: Pale pink silk moire with white lace-like serpentines in supplementary weft. Brocaded design of patch of grass with large flowers, with youth, playing a mandolin, seated on the grass.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1750–1800.Medium: silk
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade), with moire. Gift of Mrs. Montgomery Hare. 1932-11-10-a,b.
